ygData.subject: Re: i found something out
ygData.msgSnippet: It is really a shame that a few bad apples hurt the reputation of an entire class.  I try very hard to avoid kill stealing at all costs.  Still, it happens
ygData.messageBody:
It is really a shame that a few bad apples hurt the reputation of an entire
class. I try very hard to avoid kill stealing at all costs. Still, it happens
sometimes and people accept my apology for the most part, and I usually give
them a stack of beer and/or homemade food as a token of goodwill. By sticking
to this behavior I not only have no real troubles finding groups anymore, but
I'm even getting /tells now to join parties before I have chance to ask. At
first I thought it was my superior group tatics, but its probably the beer :).
Anyway please don't stereotype us as a group of killstealers because the
majority of us are not. Besides, we all know you Druids are nothing but a bunch
of powergamers :)


Cheers
Malkin

Partymind@... wrote:

> From: Partymind@...
>
> well i was playing my druid today, he's level 11, and i was fighting a
> snake. out of nowhere a wiz comes along and ks'ed the giant snake. it
> really pissed me off. his excuse was, i just want exp!!! i couldn't believe
> it. now i see why people get so pissed off at us wizards. i guess i got
> satisfaction wathcing him and his partner die. it was great. now my druid
> has hatred towards wizards and looks down upon them. i like to roleplay.
> now i see why wizards are hated and it's so hard to find a group. just
> wanted to let you know my experience from the outside.
>
> Parthon lvl 14 wiz
>
>
